50%,#0047e1);bottom:-30vh;filter:blur(20vh);height:40vh}.gradient-border{-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(10px);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);border-radius:.5rem;position:relative}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){.gradient-border{background-color:hsla(0,0%,8%,.3)}.gradient-border:before{background:linear-gradient(90deg,#303030,#303030 25%,#00dc82 50%,#36e4da
